title: Retaliation
description: One doctor, one alien lover, one botanist, and one engineer on a desperate mission to save earth from human destruction.Sakota saved Astraeus and her friends from certain death, but in doing so, she gained the attention of the Oreck, who will stop at nothing to destroy everything in their path.With their ship severely damaged, Sakota and her crew land on a nearby planet and seek sanctuary while they make repairs to return home. But nothing on this perfect planet is as it appears, and Sakota soon learns they've traded one danger for another.Hunted and targeted, will Sakota be able to carry out her mission, or will everyone she cares about be destroyed?
author: Haley Cavanagh
